tabDescriptions.idea: Enter your idea, AI will generate a complete PPT for you
tabDescriptions.outline: Have an outline? Paste it directly for quick generation, AI will automatically split it into structured outline
tabDescriptions.description: Have complete descriptions? AI will automatically parse the outline and split into page descriptions, then generate images directly

placeholders.idea: e.g., Generate a presentation about the history of AI
placeholders.outline:
Paste your PPT outline...

e.g.:
Part 1: Origins of AI
- The beginning in the 1950s
- Dartmouth Conference

Part 2: Development History
...
placeholders.description:
Paste your complete page descriptions...

e.g.:
Page 1
Title: The Birth of Artificial Intelligence
Content: In 1950, Turing proposed the "Turing Test"...

Page 2
Title: AI Development History
Content: 1950s: Symbolism...
...

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure application parameters

fields.aiProviderFormatDesc: Select API request format, affects how backend constructs and sends requests. Takes effect after saving.
fields.apiBaseUrlDesc: Set the base URL for the LLM provider API
fields.apiKeyDesc: Leave empty to keep current setting, enter new value to update
fields.textModelPlaceholder: Leave empty to use env config (e.g., gemini-3-flash-preview)
fields.textModelDesc: Model name for generating outlines, descriptions, etc.
fields.imageModelPlaceholder: Leave empty to use env config (e.g., imagen-3.0-generate-001)
fields.imageModelDesc: Model name for generating page images
fields.imageCaptionModelPlaceholder: Leave empty to use env config (e.g., gemini-3-flash-preview)
fields.imageCaptionModelDesc: Model for recognizing images in reference files and generating descriptions
fields.mineruApiBasePlaceholder: Leave empty to use env config (e.g., https://mineru.net)
fields.mineruApiBaseDesc: MinerU service address for parsing reference files
fields.mineruTokenDesc: Leave empty to keep current setting, enter new value to update
fields.imageResolution: Image Resolution (may not work with some OpenAI format proxies)
fields.imageResolutionDesc: Higher resolution generates more detailed images but takes longer
fields.maxDescriptionWorkersDesc: Maximum concurrent workers for description generation (1-20), higher is faster
fields.maxImageWorkersDesc: Maximum concurrent workers for image generation (1-20), higher is faster
fields.enableTextReasoningDesc: When enabled, text generation uses extended thinking for deeper reasoning
fields.textThinkingBudgetDesc: Token budget for text reasoning (1-8192), higher values enable deeper reasoning
fields.enableImageReasoningDesc: When enabled, image generation uses chain-of-thought mode for better composition
fields.imageThinkingBudgetDesc: Token budget for image reasoning (1-8192), higher values enable deeper reasoning
fields.baiduOcrApiKeyDesc: For text recognition in editable PPTX export, leave empty to keep current setting

settings.apiKeyTip: Get API keys from {{link}} for easier migration

help.title: Banana Slides
help.quickStartDesc: Complete basic configuration and start your AI creation journey
help.featuresIntroDesc: Explore how to use AI to quickly create beautiful PPT
help.showcasesDesc: Here are PPT examples generated with Banana Slides
help.welcomeDesc: Let's complete the basic configuration before you start
help.step1Desc: Go to settings page to configure the API services needed for the project, including:

step1Items.apiConfig: Your AI service provider's API Base and API Key
step1Items.modelConfig: Configure text, image generation model (banana pro) and image caption model
step1Items.mineruConfig: If you need file parsing, configure MinerU Token
step1Items.editableExport: If you need editable export, configure MinerU TOKEN and Baidu API KEY

help.step2Desc: After configuration, be sure to click "Save Settings" button, then test services at the bottom of the page to ensure everything works properly.
help.step3Desc: After successful configuration, return to home page to start using AI to generate beautiful PPT!
help.step4Desc: If you encounter issues while using, please raise them on GitHub issues
help.tipContent: If you don't have an API Key yet, you can register on the corresponding service provider's website. After configuration, it's recommended to test services first to avoid issues later.

showcaseTitles.prefabFood: Smart Production Line Equipment for Prefabricated Food
showcaseTitles.moneyHistory: The Evolution of Money: From Shells to Paper Currency

flexiblePaths.title: Flexible Creation Paths
flexiblePaths.description: Support for ideas, outlines, and page descriptions as starting points to suit different creative habits.
details: One-click generation: Enter a topic, AI automatically generates a well-structured outline and page-by-page content descriptions
Natural language editing: Support vibe-style oral modifications to outlines or descriptions, AI responds in real-time
Outline/Description mode: Both batch generation and manual fine-tuning are available

materialParsing.title: Powerful Material Parsing
materialParsing.description: Upload files in various formats, automatically parse content to provide rich materials for generation.
details: Multi-format support: Upload PDF/Docx/MD/Txt files, automatic content parsing in the background
Smart extraction: Automatically identify key points, image links, and chart information in text
Style reference: Support uploading reference images or templates to customize PPT style

vibeEditing.title: "Vibe" Style Natural Language Editing
vibeEditing.description: No longer limited to complex menu buttons, give editing instructions directly through natural language.
details: Local repainting: Make verbal modifications to unsatisfied areas (e.g., "Change this chart to a pie chart")
Full page optimization: Generate HD, style-consistent pages based on nano banana proüçå

easyExport.title: Ready-to-Use Format Export
easyExport.description: One-click export to standard formats, ready for presentation without adjustment.
details: Multi-format support: One-click export to standard PPTX or PDF files
Perfect adaptation: Default 16:9 ratio, no secondary layout adjustment needed

material.generatedPreview: Generated material will be displayed here

projectSettings.title: Settings
projectSettings.projectConfigDesc: These settings only apply to the current project and do not affect other projects
projectSettings.globalConfigDesc: These settings apply to all projects
projectSettings.extraRequirementsDesc: When generating each page, AI will refer to these extra requirements
projectSettings.extraRequirementsPlaceholder: e.g., Use compact layout, display main outline title at top, include more PPT illustrations...
projectSettings.styleDescriptionDesc: Describe your expected overall PPT style, AI will generate pages accordingly
projectSettings.styleDescriptionPlaceholder: e.g., Minimalist business style, using dark blue and white colors, clear and elegant fonts, clean layout...
projectSettings.styleTip: Style description will be automatically added to the prompt when generating images. If a template image is also uploaded, the style description will serve as supplementary information.
projectSettings.editablePptxExportDesc: Configure how "Export Editable PPTX" feature works. These settings affect export quality and API call costs.
projectSettings.extractorMethodDesc: Choose how to extract editable components like text and tables from PPT images
projectSettings.extractorHybridDesc: MinerU layout analysis + Baidu high-precision OCR for more accurate text recognition
projectSettings.extractorMineruDesc: Use only MinerU for layout analysis and text recognition
projectSettings.backgroundMethodDesc: Choose how to generate clean background images (remove text from original image for PPT background)
projectSettings.backgroundHybridDesc: Baidu precise text removal + generative model for image quality enhancement
projectSettings.backgroundGenerativeDesc: Use generative AI model (e.g., Gemini) to directly generate background, high quality but may have residual elements
projectSettings.backgroundBaiduDesc: Use Baidu image repair API, fast but average quality
projectSettings.costTip: Options marked with "Uses AI Image Model" will call AI image generation API (e.g., Gemini), incurring additional API call costs per page. To control costs, consider using "Baidu Inpainting".
projectSettings.errorHandlingDesc: Configure how to handle errors during export
projectSettings.allowPartialResultDesc: When enabled, if errors occur during export (e.g., style extraction failed, text rendering failed), they will be skipped and export will continue, potentially resulting in incomplete output. When disabled, any error will immediately stop export and show the specific reason.
projectSettings.allowPartialResultWarning: Enabling this option may result in missing text styles, incorrect element positions, or missing content in the exported PPTX file. Only enable this when you need quick results and can accept quality loss.

template.saveToLibraryOnUpload: Save to my template library when uploading
template.cannotDeleteInUse: Cannot delete template in use, please deselect or switch first

messages.loadFailed: Failed to load reference file list
messages.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one file
messages.parseTriggered: Triggered parsing for {{count}} file(s), will run in background

export.settingsTip: You can adjust settings or enable "Allow Partial Results" in "Project Settings ‚Üí Export Settings"

slideCard.confirmDeletePage: Are you sure you want to delete this page?

businessSimple.name: Simple Business
businessSimple.description:
Visual description: The global visual language should embody the professionalism and stability of top international consulting firms (such as McKinsey or Boston Consulting). The overall style pursues extreme flatness and sense of order, rejecting unnecessary decoration, emphasizing clear communication of information. The lighting environment should be uniform studio diffused light, without obvious dramatic shadows, ensuring a clean and bright picture.

Color and material: The background color must be locked to the deep, authoritative "Navy Blue" (Navy Blue, #0B1F3B), while foreground elements use pure white (#FFFFFF) and a small amount of sky blue (Sky Blue, #38BDF8) as accents; avoid complex textures, use matte paper texture or smooth vector blocks.

Content and layout: The layout logic follows a strict modular grid system. Generate clear geometric partitions, using thin lines or faint light gray blocks (Light Gray, #E5E7EB) to divide content areas. For fonts, apply bold sans-serif fonts (such as Helvetica or Roboto) for titles, keeping body text thin and clear. Chart elements should be flat 2D vector graphics, such as simple bar charts or pie charts, with single and restrained colors.

Rendering requirements: Vector illustration style, extremely high definition, whether text or graphic edges should be sharp without aliasing, showcasing rigorous business aesthetics, suitable for Fortune 500 company presentations.

techModern.name: Modern Tech
techModern.description:
Visual description: The global visual language should blend cyberpunk with the futuristic sense of modern SaaS products. The overall atmosphere is mysterious, deep, and dynamic, as if in a high-tech data center or virtual space. Lighting uses self-illumination effects in a dark environment, simulating the glow of neon tubes and lasers.

Color and material: The background color uses the deep "Midnight Black" (#0B0F19) to set off the brightness of the foreground. The main color uses high-saturation "Electric Blue" (#00A3FF) and "Cyber Purple" (#7C3AED) for linear gradients, creating a flowing energy feel. Materials extensively use semi-transparent glass, glowing grid lines, and geometric bodies with metallic sheen.

Content and layout: The picture should contain floating 3D geometric elements (such as cubes, tetrahedrons, or chip structures), these elements should have wireframe rendering effects. Layout tends toward asymmetric dynamic balance, using tech-style monospace fonts or modern sans-serif fonts. The background can subtly add circuit board textures, binary code streams, or dot matrix maps as decoration, increasing detail density.

Rendering requirements: Octane Render style, emphasizing ray tracing, bloom effects, and depth of field control, presenting fine particle effects and visual impact full of technological tension.

academicFormal.name: Formal Academic
academicFormal.description:
Visual description: The global visual language should imitate the layout style of high-quality print publications or classic papers, conveying rationality, objectivity, and the weight of knowledge. The overall atmosphere is quiet, restrained, without any glare or over-design that interferes with the line of sight. The picture must fill the full screen, no book binding lines, paper edges, curled corners, shadows, or any form of border. The background should not appear three-dimensional, but should be presented in a two-dimensional plane.

Color and material: The background color is strictly limited to "Off-white" (#F8F7F2), simulating the texture of high-grade woodfree paper. Foreground colors only use pure black (#000000), charcoal gray (#1F2937), and deep red (#7F1D1D) or deep blue (#1E3A8A) as accent colors (this accent color should not exceed 5%). The material is completely presented as high-quality paper printing effect, with delicate paper texture.

Content and layout: Layout must follow classic typographic design principles, with wide margins. Use serif fonts (similar to Times New Roman or Garamond) to embody tradition and formality. Visual elements mainly consist of fine black line boxes (#000000), standard academic table styles, and black and white line drawings (#000000 / #FFFFFF). Use left-right columns or top-bottom structure with strict alignment.

Rendering requirements: Ultra-high resolution scan style, emphasizing the grayscale anti-aliasing effect of fonts and the sharpness of lines, the picture is like the inner page of a hardcover academic journal, showing absolute professionalism and authority. No form of page border should exist, such as black borders or shadow lines.

creativeFun.name: Creative Fun
creativeFun.description:
Visual description: The global visual language should be like a vibrant startup Pitch Deck or children's educational app interface. The overall atmosphere is relaxed, pleasant, full of imagination, breaking conventional constraints. Lighting is bright and full of sunshine, no shadows between colors, presenting thorough flatness.

Color and material: The background color uses high-brightness "Warm Yellow" (#FFD54A). The color scheme is extremely bold, mixing vibrant "Vibrant Orange" (#FF6A00), "Grass Green" (#22C55E), and "Sky Blue" (#38BDF8), forming Memphis-style color collision effects. Materials simulate hand-drawn doodles, paper cutting, or rough-edged vector illustrations.

Content and layout: The picture content should include hand-drawn style illustration elements, such as doodle arrows, stars, wavy lines, and irregular organic shape blocks. Layout allows text to tilt, overlap, or jump, breaking the rigid grid. Use rounded cute fonts or handwriting fonts. Place some anthropomorphized cute objects or exaggerated speech bubbles in the corners.

Rendering requirements: Dribbble popular illustration style, bright flat colors, smooth and elastic lines, visually giving a happy, friendly, and extremely approachable feeling.

minimalistClean.name: Minimalist Clean
minimalistClean.description:
Visual description: The global visual language draws from Scandinavian Design and Kinfolk magazine aesthetics. The overall atmosphere is ethereal and serene, emphasizing the philosophy of "less is more". Lighting uses extremely soft diffused skylight, shadows are very light with blurred edges, creating an airy feel.

Color and material: The background color is the extremely light "Haze Gray" (#F5F5F7). Foreground colors only use mid-gray (#6B7280) and low-saturation Morandi colors (such as Morandi Gray Blue #7A8FA6) as tiny accents. Materials reflect fine matte texture, occasionally appearing a little plaster micro-texture.

Content and layout: The core of the composition is "Negative Space", white space should occupy more than 70% of the picture. Layout is extremely restrained, text font size is small, line spacing is wide, using thin and elegant sans-serif fonts. Visual anchors are simple geometric line icons, layout pursues absolute balance.

Rendering requirements: Minimalist photography style, high dynamic range (HDR), the picture is extremely clean without any noise, showing a gallery-like art display feel.

luxuryPremium.name: Luxury Premium
luxuryPremium.description:
Visual description: The global visual language should blend the brand image of high-end watch advertisements or five-star hotels. The overall atmosphere is mysterious, noble, and unique. Lighting uses dramatic Rembrandt light or spotlight effects, highlighting key elements, while the rest fades into darkness.

Color and material: The background color is strictly locked to the deep "Obsidian Black" (#0B0B0F). The foreground color is mainly composed of "Champagne Gold" (#F7E7CE). Materials must reflect an expensive touch, the core combination being: background showing matte black velvet texture, foreground decorations showing brushed metal texture.

Content and layout: Layout uses classic center alignment or symmetrical layout, emphasizing ceremonial feel. Fonts must use elegant serif fonts, with slightly widened letter spacing to reflect nobility. The picture can add delicate gold border lines, Art Deco style decorative patterns. If there are 3D objects, they should show a jewel-like polished texture.

Rendering requirements: Film-grade realistic rendering, emphasizing material physical properties (PBR), especially the highlight reflections of metal and the diffuse reflection details of velvet, the picture presents the premium quality of luxury advertising.

natureFresh.name: Nature Fresh
natureFresh.description:
Visual description: The global visual language aims to evoke people's longing for nature, environmental protection, and healthy living, similar to the brand visuals of Whole Foods or Aesop. The overall atmosphere is healing, breathable, and organic. Lighting simulates the dappled sunlight through leaves in early morning (Tyndall effect), warm and soft.

Color and material: The background color uses the soft "Beige" (#EAD9C6). The color scheme is taken from nature, focusing on Forest Green (#14532D) and Earth Brown (#7A4E2D). Materials emphasize natural textures, such as the graininess of recycled paper and the veins of plant leaves.

Content and layout: The picture should integrate real natural elements, mainly extending green plant leaves, these elements can serve as background decoration or foreground frames. Layout uses rounded and friendly fonts. Layout can be slightly loose, imitating the form of natural growth. Shadow processing should be soft and natural, avoiding harsh black shadows.

Rendering requirements: Macro photography style combined with 3D rendering, emphasizing the subsurface scattering of plant surfaces and the delicate texture of natural materials, the picture is fresh and elegant, refreshing.

gradientVibrant.name: Vibrant Gradient
gradientVibrant.description:
Visual description: The global visual language benchmarks the website visuals of modern tech unicorn companies (such as Stripe or Linear), presenting an aurora-like flowing beauty. The overall atmosphere is dreamy, transparent, and breathing, avoiding eye-catching color collision, emphasizing elegant fusion between colors.

Color and material: Background is foreground, using full-screen diffused gradient colors. The color scheme uses elegant and harmonious "holographic colors", with deep "Royal Blue" (#2563EB) as the base, smoothly transitioning to "Violet" (#7C3AED) and bright "Magenta" (#DB2777). Colors blend like watercolors, without hard boundaries. Materials are locked to "Frosted Glass" texture, making colors look like they're coming through a frosted screen, adding a hazy premium feel. Illustrations use textured semi-3D colorful designs.

Content and layout: The core of the picture is slowly flowing organic wave shapes, with soft and natural forms. Layout uses bold sans-serif fonts, text color is pure white (#FFFFFF), ensuring absolute clarity on the colorful background. Interface elements use "Glassmorphism", namely highly transparent white rounded cards with delicate white borders and background blur effects.

Rendering requirements: C4D fluid simulation rendering, emphasizing "silk" smooth luster, with slight grain added for texture, colors are saturated but not glaring, showcasing the modern digital aesthetics of flowing light and colors.

edit.desc: Edit PPT like a document, seamlessly switch between outline and detail modes.

visual.title: Smart Visuals
visual.desc: Automatically match high-quality images based on content to make presentations more vivid.

export.title: Fast Export
export.desc: Support export to PPTX format, retaining all editable properties.
